definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Rovaniemi is located in the Finnish Lapland, the home region of the Santa-Claus.
sentences.chinese: 羅凡尼米位於芬蘭拉普蘭，是聖誕老人的故鄉。

sentences.english: From Lapland to the Azores , the single currency is a reality.
sentences.chinese: 從拉普蘭到亞速而島，統一的貨幣已經成爲了現實。

sentences.english: While I was there in Lapland, it was about 15 degrees during the day.
sentences.chinese: 當我在拉普蘭的時候，白天的氣溫大約是華氏15度。
怎麼從赫爾辛基到拉普蘭德？
